metadata.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
metadata.description:
The official video for “Never Gonna Give You Up” by Rick Astley. 

Never: The Autobiography 📚 OUT NOW! 
Follow this link to get your copy and listen to Rick’s ‘Never’ playlist ❤️ #RickAstleyNever
https://linktr.ee/rickastleynever

“Never Gonna Give You Up” was a global smash on its release in July 1987, topping the charts in 25 countries including Rick’s native UK and the US Billboard Hot 100.  It also won the Brit Award for Best single in 1988. Stock Aitken and Waterman wrote and produced the track which was the lead-off single and lead track from Rick’s debut LP “Whenever You Need Somebody”.  The album was itself a UK number one and would go on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide.

The legendary video was directed by Simon West – who later went on to make Hollywood blockbusters such as Con Air, Lara Croft – Tomb Raider and The Expendables 2.  The video passed the 1bn YouTube views milestone on 28 July 2021.

Subscribe to the official Rick Astley YouTube channel: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/YTSubID

Follow Rick Astley:
Facebook: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/FBFollowID 
Twitter: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TwitterID 
Instagram: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/InstagramID 
Website: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/storeID 
TikTok: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TikTokID

Listen to Rick Astley:
Spotify: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/SpotifyID 
Apple Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AppleMusicID 
Amazon Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AmazonMusicID 
Deezer: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/DeezerID 

Lyrics:
We’re no strangers to love
You know the rules and so do I
A full commitment’s what I’m thinking of
You wouldn’t get this from any other guy

I just wanna tell you how I’m feeling
Gotta make you understand

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

We’ve known each other for so long
Your heart’s been aching but you’re too shy to say it
Inside we both know what’s been going on
We know the game and we’re gonna play it

And if you ask me how I’m feeling
Don’t tell me you’re too blind to see

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

#RickAstley #NeverGonnaGiveYouUp #WheneverYouNeedSomebody #OfficialMusicVideo

fortnite never gonna give you up
never gonna give u up lyrics
never gonna give you up karaoke

key_points.text: The Narrator acknowledges a shared understanding of relationship 'rules' with the Subject.
The Narrator is committed to a 'full commitment' in the relationship.
The Narrator asserts their unique dedication, suggesting others would not offer the same.
The Narrator expresses a desire to fully communicate their feelings to the Subject.
The Narrator pledges unwavering loyalty, promising never to give up on the Subject.
The Narrator promises never to let the Subject down.
The Narrator assures they will not abandon the Subject by 'running around and deserting' them.
The Narrator guarantees they will not intentionally cause the Subject emotional distress or crying.
The Narrator commits to remaining in the relationship, promising never to say goodbye.
The Narrator promises complete honesty, vowing never to tell a lie that would hurt the Subject.
Both the Narrator and Subject have known each other for a significant duration, implying a shared history.
The Subject has experienced emotional pain, described as an 'aching heart'.
The Subject's shyness prevents them from openly expressing their feelings or pain.
There is a mutual, unspoken understanding between the Narrator and Subject about their ongoing situation.
Both parties are aware of the 'game' (metaphor for relationship dynamics) and intend to engage in it.
The Narrator challenges the Subject's potential 'blindness' to the Narrator's feelings, implying they are clear.
The Narrator reiterates their desire to convey their emotions if asked.
The repeated assurances emphasize the Narrator's steadfast and dependable nature.
The dynamic suggests one party (Subject) is hesitant while the other (Narrator) is overtly expressive and reassuring.
The song conveys a message of protective and unconditional affection.

summary:
The transcript is a lyrical expression of profound and unwavering commitment from a narrator to a beloved subject. The narrator emphasizes a deep, shared history, indicating that they have known each other for a significant period and understand the unspoken dynamics of their relationship. Despite the subject's apparent shyness and past emotional pain, the narrator insists on their unique dedication, highlighting that such steadfastness would not be found elsewhere.

Central to the narrative is a series of strong, absolute promises made by the narrator. They pledge never to abandon, disappoint, or betray the subject. These vows extend to never causing emotional harm, deceit, or a definitive separation. The narrator's intention is to foster an environment of complete trust and emotional security, ensuring the subject feels protected and valued.

The lyrics reveal a desire for open communication from the narrator, who wishes to make their feelings explicitly clear and ensure the subject's understanding, implicitly challenging any reluctance or 'blindness' on the subject's part to fully grasp the depth of this commitment. The overall message is one of resolute loyalty, unconditional support, and an enduring promise to uphold the integrity and emotional well-being of the relationship.
